program.name: xterm
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch" LDFLAGS="-Wl,+nodefaultrpath" ARGS="--enable-hp-fkeys --disable-input-method" ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae +Ofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" ARGS="--enable-hp-fkeys --disable-input-method" ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch" ARGS="--enable-hp-fkeys --disable-input-method" ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" ARGS="--with-utempter" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--with-utempter" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" ARGS="--disable-input-method" ;; *-solaris2.8*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" ARGS="--disable-input-method" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" ARGS="--disable-input-method" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" --enable-logging \ --enable-wide-chars --enable-256-color --disable-freetype \ --enable-exec-xterm --enable-luit \ --with-icondir="${_datadir}/pixmaps" \ ${ARGS+${ARGS}} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
program.install:
gmake install
# compile terminfo files if [ "${SB_VAR_NCURSES+set}" = "set" ]; then TERMINFO=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/terminfo \ ${SB_VAR_NCURSES}/bin/gnutic terminfo else TERMINFO=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/terminfo \ /usr/bin/tic terminfo fi
${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 terminfo \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/xterm.terminfo ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 termcap \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/xterm.termcap
# Modify permissions for utmp/wtmp support case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*|*-irix*|*-osf*) ${SB_PATH_CHMOD} 4555 ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/xterm ;; esac

note.para: Utmp and Wtmp support has been enabled for xterm. On HP-UX, IRIX, Redhat Linux, and Tru64 UNIX, xterm is suid root to enable writing to the utmp and wtmp files on HP-UX, IRIX, and Tru64 UNIX.
Color support is available "out of the box" for all platforms.

item.para: Remove support for AIX 4, HP-UX 10, RHEL 3, SLES, Solaris 6 and 7
